		                    Intermediate-Risk Neuroblastoma
		                    Treatment of intermediate-risk neuroblastoma may include the following:         -  Chemotherapy for children with symptoms or to shrink a tumor that cannot be removed by surgery. Surgery may be done after chemotherapy.    - Surgery alone for infants.
